Package com.eventApp.DAO

package com.eventApp.DAO
Data Access Object (DAO) package for database operations in CampusConnect.

This package contains all classes responsible for interacting with the PostgreSQL database. Each DAO class encapsulates SQL operations for a specific entity or functional area.

<h3>Key DAO Classes:</h3>
  • UserDAO - User authentication and profile management
  • StudentDAO - Student-specific database operations
  • AdminDAO - Administrative database operations
  • ClubDAO - Club management and queries
  • EventDAO - Event creation, modification, and retrieval
  • ClubMemberDAO - Club membership management
  • EventRegistrationDAO - Event registration and participation
  • NotificationDAO - Notification system operations

All DAO classes use JDBC for database connectivity and include proper error handling and resource management.

Since:
1.0
